duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform maintenance on all types of mining equipment including mechanical, electrical, and hydraulic components.
Manage and control downtime by implementing preventive maintenance techniques and monitoring compliance with safety standards.
Keep accurate records of equipment failures and repairs, and perform minor welding and body work as required.
Report potentially unsafe conditions and ensure compliance with safety, health, and environmental standards.
Purchase and pick up parts, attend safety meetings, and actively promote and observe safety and security procedures.
Work independently, demonstrate initiative, and help train others while following all MSHA guidelines.
Stand, stoop, bend, lift, walk, climb, and work in varied outdoor environmental conditions.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years diesel mechanic experience, preferably in a construction or mining environment. MSHA certification required.
